item.title: Post Punk playlist for 12/2012
item.description: Including: Future Islands, John Maus, Joy Division, Magazine, Siouxsie And The Banshees, Sonic Youth, Talking Heads, The Cure, The Soft Moon, Tubeway Army.

item.title: Post Punk playlist for 11/2012
item.description: Including: Bauhaus, Gang Of Four, Mission Of Burma, Poptones, Sonic Youth, Suicide, The Birthday Party, The Chills, This Heat, Wire.

item.title: Post Punk playlist for 10/2012
item.description: Including: Killing Joke, Liliput, Lucretia, My Reflection, Nick Cave, Pere Ubu, Sad Lovers & Giants, Southern Death Cult, The Horrors, The Sisters Of Mercy, Tropic Of Cancer.

item.title: Post Punk playlist for 9/2012
item.description: Including: Bikini Kill, Das Kabinette, Death In June, John Maus, Josef K, Killing Joke, Magazine, New Order, The Clash, The Soft Moon.

item.title: Post Punk playlist for 8/2012
item.description: Including: Bauhaus, Gary Numan, Gazelle Twin, Iceage, Joy Division, Psychic Tv, The Chameleons, The Fall, The Jesus And Mary Chain, This Mortal Coil.

item.title: Post Punk playlist for 7/2012
item.description: Including: Altered Images, Durutti Column, Einstürzende Neubauten, Led Er Est, Lower Dens, Nick Cave & The Bad Seeds, Section 25, The Cure, The Pop Group, Tuxedomoon.

item.title: Post Punk playlist for 6/2012
item.description: Including: Bauhaus, Feedtime, Mekons, Rapeman, Saccharine Trust, Sugarcubes, The Birthday Party, The Cleaners From Venus, The Fall, Today Is The Day.

item.title: Post Punk playlist for 5/2012
item.description: Including: 14, Aztec Camera, Blank Dogs, Gl*Xo Babies*, My Bloody Valentine, Nick Cave, Pere Ubu, Sexbeat, Sisters Of Mercy, The Teardrop Explodes.

item.title: Post Punk playlist for 4/2012
item.description: Including: A Certain Ratio, A Place To Bury Strangers, Buzzcocks, Death In June, Delta 5, Joy Division, New Order, The House Of Love, The Slits, Undiscovered Country.

item.title: Post Punk playlist for 3/2012
item.description: Including: Adult., Blonde Redhead, Lowlife, Magazine, Talking Heads, The Birthday Party, The Cure, The Screamers, The Soft Moon, Wire.
